title: Visitor visa
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== Subclass 600 Visitor visa For tourists, business visitors or to visit family for 3, 6 or 12 months Basic Eligibility be a genuine visitor have enough funds to support your stay and leave Find out what you can do to help us process your application faster Australian citizens are ineligible to apply for an eVisitor visa, refer to Entering Australia Visitor visa holders need to be aware of new laws restricting visa hopping to the Student visa program Visitor visa (subclass 600) Tourist stream (apply outside Australia) This visa stream lets you visit Australia as a tourist, to go on a cruise or to visit family and friends. Stay Up to 12 months Cost From AUD200.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​We might grant you a stay of 3, 6 or 12 months Visit friends and family, cruise or have a holiday You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa. Details Visitor visa (subclass 600) Tourist stream (apply in Australia) This visa stream lets you visit Australia as a tourist, to visit family and friends or for purposes other than business or medical treatment. Stay Up to 12 months Cost From AUD500.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​We might grant you a stay of up to 12 months Visit friends and family, cruise or have a holiday If you hold another visa that is expiring and want to stay longer, this visa might suit you You must be in Australia when you apply and when we decide your application. Details Visitor visa (subclass 600) Business visitor stream This visa stream lets you visit Australia for business reasons. Stay Up to 3 months Cost AUD200.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You can make a short visit for business visitor reasons, but you can't work or sell goods or services We might let you enter Australia once or many times while the visa is valid You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa Details Visitor visa (subclass 600) Approved Destination Status stream This visa stream is for citizens from certain areas of China visiting Australia on a tour organised by an approved travel agent. Stay For the period or until the date we specify in your grant letter Cost AUD200.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. Visa processing times are based on the age of applications finalised in a given period. Many applications finalised recently had been on-hand for some months while borders were closed. For more information see visa processing times ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This visa lets citizens of the People's Republic of China (excluding SARs) visit Australia with an organised tour group You must remain with the organised tour group Details Visitor visa (subclass 600) Frequent traveller stream This visa stream is for citizens of the People's Republic of China, Brunei, Cambodia, Philippines, Laos, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam or Timor Leste who travel often to Australia for tourism or business visitor activities. Stay The visa can be granted for up to 10 years. Stay up to 3 months each time you enter. Cost AUD1,480.00 Processing Time Processing times for this visa are unavailable. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​We might grant a validity period for up to 10 years Visit for tourism and/or business visitor activities ​​You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa. Details Visitor visa (subclass 600) Sponsored family stream This visa stream lets people who are sponsored, usually by a family member, come to Australia to visit their family members. Stay Up to 12 months Cost AUD200.00 . We might ask your sponsor to pay a security bond. Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ ​You must be sponsored by an eligible family member who is an Australian citizen or permanent resident We might ask your sponsor to pay a security bond You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa. Details
main_content:
===== main placeholder ==========================================

Subclass 600

Subclass 600

# Visitor visa

Visitor visa

For tourists, business visitors or to visit family for 3, 6 or 12 months

For tourists, business visitors or to visit family for 3, 6 or 12 months

### Basic Eligibility

Basic Eligibility
- be a genuine visitor
be a genuine visitor
- have enough funds to support your stay and leave
have enough funds to support your stay and leave

Find out what you can do tohelp us process your application faster.Australian citizens are ineligible to apply for an eVisitor visa, refer toEntering Australia.Visitor visa holders need to be aware of new lawsrestricting visa hopping to the Student visa program.​

Find out what you can do tohelp us process your application faster.

Find out what you can do to
help us process your application faster
.

Australian citizens are ineligible to apply for an eVisitor visa, refer toEntering Australia.

Australian citizens are ineligible to apply for an eVisitor visa, refer to
Entering Australia
.

Visitor visa holders need to be aware of new lawsrestricting visa hopping to the Student visa program.

Visitor visa holders need to be aware of new laws
restricting visa hopping to the Student visa program
.
​
Visitor visa (subclass 600)

## Tourist stream (apply outside Australia)

Tourist stream (apply outside Australia)
This visa stream lets you visit Australia as a tourist, to go on a cruise or to visit family and friends.
Stay

Up to 12 months

Up to 12 months
Cost

FromAUD200.00

From
AUD200.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the
visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​We might grant you a stay of 3, 6 or 12 months
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​We might grant you a stay of 3, 6 or 12 months
- Visit friends and family, cruise or have a holiday
Visit friends and family, cruise or have a holiday
- You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa.
You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa.
Details
Visitor visa (subclass 600)

## Tourist stream (apply in Australia)

Tourist stream (apply in Australia)
This visa stream lets you visit Australia as a tourist, to visit family and friends or for purposes other than business or medical treatment.
Stay

Up to 12 months

Up to 12 months
Cost

FromAUD500.00

From
AUD500.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the
visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​We might grant you a stay of up to 12 months
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​We might grant you a stay of up to 12 months
- Visit friends and family, cruise or have a holiday
Visit friends and family, cruise or have a holiday
- If you hold another visa that is expiring and want to stay longer, this visa might suit you
If you hold another visa that is expiring and want to stay longer, this visa might suit you
- You must be in Australia when you apply and when we decide your application.
You must be in Australia when you apply and when we decide your application.
Details
Visitor visa (subclass 600)

## Business visitor stream

Business visitor stream
This visa stream lets you visit Australia for business reasons.
Stay

Up to 3 months

Up to 3 months
Cost

AUD200.00

AUD200.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the
visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You can make a short visit for business visitor reasons, but you can't work or sell goods or services
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You can make a short visit for business visitor reasons, but you can't work or sell goods or services
- We might let you enter Australia once or many times while the visa is valid
We might let you enter Australia once or many times while the visa is valid
- You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa
You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa
Details
Visitor visa (subclass 600)

## Approved Destination Status stream

Approved Destination Status stream
This visa stream is for citizens from certain areas of China visiting Australia on a tour organised by an approved travel agent.
Stay

For the period or until the date we specify in your grant letter

For the period or until the date we specify in your grant letter
Cost

AUD200.00

AUD200.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the
visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

Visa processing times are based on the age of applications finalised in a given period. Many applications finalised recently had been on-hand for some months while borders were closed.

Visa processing times are based on the age of applications finalised in a given period. Many applications finalised recently had been on-hand for some months while borders were closed.

For more information seevisa processing times.

For more information see
visa processing times
.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This visa lets citizens of the People's Republic of China (excluding SARs) visit Australia with an organised tour group
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This visa lets citizens of the People's Republic of China (excluding SARs) visit Australia with an organised tour group
- You must remain with the organised tour group
You must remain with the organised tour group
Details
Visitor visa (subclass 600)

## Frequent traveller stream

Frequent traveller stream
This visa stream is for citizens of the People's Republic of China, Brunei, Cambodia, Philippines, Laos, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam or Timor Leste who travel often to Australia for tourism or business visitor activities.
Stay

The visa can be granted for up to 10 years. Stay up to 3 months each time you enter.

The visa can be granted for up to 10 years. Stay up to 3 months each time you enter.
Cost

AUD1,480.00

AUD1,480.00
Processing Time

Processing times for this visa are unavailable.

Processing times for this visa are unavailable.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​We might grant a validity period for up to 10 years
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​We might grant a validity period for up to 10 years
- Visit for tourism and/or business visitor activities
Visit for tourism and/or business visitor activities
- ​​You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa.
​​You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa.
Details
Visitor visa (subclass 600)

## Sponsored family stream

Sponsored family stream
This visa stream lets people who are sponsored, usually by a family member, come to Australia to visit their family members.
Stay

Up to 12 months

Up to 12 months
Cost

AUD200.00. We might ask your sponsor to pay a security bond.

AUD200.00
. We might ask your sponsor to pay a security bond.
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the
visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​
      ​You must be sponsored by an eligible family member who is an Australian citizen or permanent resident

      ​You must be sponsored by an eligible family member who is an Australian citizen or permanent resident
- We might ask your sponsor to pay a security bond

- You must be outside Australia when you apply and when we decide your visa.
